content: single_crochet in next st sk1 3dc in next st* repeat from * to * until 2sts remaining sk1 single_crochet on top of beginning chain from last row turn row 3 ch3 double_crochet in same st sk1 single_crochet in next st *sk1 3dc in next st sk1 single_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * until 2sts remaining sk1 2dc in last st turn row 4-32 repeat row 2 and 3 finishing with a repeat of row 2 turn your work you will be working on the round facing the right side from here never turn your work round 1 ch4 double_crochet in same place sk3 sts *v-st in next single_crochet sk3 sts* repeat from * to * until 4sts remaining before corner double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch3 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet into the st to form a corner sk3 sps **v-st in next space sk3 sps** repeat from ** to ** until next corner see pictures below top of placemat ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira pattern continuation placemat continue of round 1 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch3 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in corner skip sts until where you made the 3dcs set from your starting chain ***v-st on that st skip sts until next st you made the 3dcs set of starting chain*** repeat from *** to *** until next corner see picture a continue of round 1 repeat pattern from to until end corner double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch3 in last corner join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg turning chain see picture b note at the end of round 1 you will have in each top and bottom length 38 dcs 17 ch3 sps 2 ch1 sps and you will have on each side width 26 dcs 11 ch3 sps and 2 ch1 sps this is important to the last round afterwards for all stitches placements to be correct ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira pattern continuation placemat round 2 ch1 single_crochet in next ch1 space ch4 skip next double_crochet *single_crochet in next ch3 space ch4 skip next double_crochet* repeat from * to * until the ch1 space before corner single_crochet in ch1 space ch1 single_crochet ch4 single_crochet in space corner repeat pattern from to until end ch1 join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet from beg of round see picture c and d note in round 3 which is the last round pattern is different from top/bottom and sides at the middle please pay attention and take a look at pictures provided for round 3 round 3 ch1 single_crochet in next ch4 space * skip next single_crochet 6dc in next ch4 space skip next single_crochet single_crochet in next ch4 space* repeat from * to * x 3 see picture e ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira pattern continuation placemat continue of round 3 3dc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next ch4 space repeat from * to * x 4 until ch1 space before corner see pictures f and g continue of round 3 double_crochet in ch1 space ch1 10dc in
